author: Staff Reporter
text:
Five dengue positive cases have been reported in the city this month, say Coimbatore Corporation sources. The Corporation has recorded the cases in Kuniamuthur, Rathinapuri, Vadavalli, Sowripalayam and Avarampalayam.

Isolated cases

They are isolated cases and there have been no increase in cases where the dengue-positive persons resided, the sources say and add that the health wing officials are, however, keeping a close watch.

Fogging

In Poompuhar Nagar in Ward 06, there are reports that there is one more dengue-positive case but the Corporation is unable to confirm the same as it is yet to get reports that confirm dengue. But after residents of the area complained of increase in fever cases, the civic body carried out fogging to assuage their fears. The sources add that dengue is very much under control as day-to-day monitoring is takes place.

Cases recorded in Vadavalli Kuniamuthur, Rathinapuri, Sowripalayam and Avarampalayam
title: Five test positive for dengue so far this month
